name: Tropical Dive Adventures
description:
COME AND DIVE THE BAHAMAS WITH US!

We will be setting sail with Blackbeards Cruises and exploring the crystal clear water of central Bahamas.
With the live-aboard style trip we have the flexibility to go where the weather and dive conditions are the best. Over the week we will experience wall dives that begin as shallow as 40′, explore blue holes covered with colorful corals and drift dives through the cays.
